language.title: About
language.subtitle: about openamq
language.content:
Credits *******
The Producers =============
- Produced by [http://www.imatix.com:iMatix Corporation] - Written and directed by Pieter Hintjens & John O'Hara
On Location ===========
- Brussels: Pieter Hintjens | Tim Esselens | Gustavo Broos - Bratislava: Martin Sustrik | Martin Lucina | Lubica Segecova - Melborne: Jonathan Schultz - London: Mark Atwell | Steve Connelly | Samiullah Shaikh | Mahesh Karmarkar - Glasgow: Robert Grieg
With Thanks To ==============
- The Free Software Foundation's [http://www.gnu.org/:GNU tools and languages] - iMatix Corporation's [http://www.imatix.net/mop/:model-oriented programming (MOP)] tools and languages. - The Apache Foundation's [http://apr.apache.org/:Portable Runtime] - Atlassian [http://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/:Jira system] for change management - Tigris.org's [http://subversion.tigris.org/:Subversion] for source control - Philip Hazel's [http://www.pcre.org/:PCRE library] - Greg Roelofs and Jean-loup Gailly's [http://www.zlib.net/:zlib library]
